generic.no-pm: :no_entry: This Command does not work in private channels!
generic.nan: Whatever you just send, please just add a whole number. :)
generic.no-song-in-queue: There is no song in the queue, maybe add one :musical_note: ?
generic.no-song-playing: There is no song playing at the moment!
generic.no-permission: You dont have the permission to use this Command, please add a discord role named WolkeBot to yourself to use it.
generic.no-voice: I am not connected to any voice channel on this Server!
generic.empty-search: You did not enter a search Term!
generic.negative: Please dont use a negative number!

help.intro: lets have fun together here on Discord (/^â–½^)/ Commands you can write:
help.bug: get the Link of the support discord
help.add: Get a link to add me to your server
help.voice: i join the Voice Channel you are currently in (normal music commands make the bot join the voice channel too)
help.silent: i leave the Voice Channel i am currently connected to. (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.play: Play a Song/Youtube Video max Length: 1H30M (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.pause: Pause the Current Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.resume: Resume the pause Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.volume: Sets the Volume of the Bot, Values between 1-200 (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.forever: Temporarely disabled until i fixed it
help.search: Searches for a Song in the Bot Database and shows the 5 best Results
help.skip: Skips the Current Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.voteskip: Starts a Voteskip for the current Song, more than 50% of the channel have to vote, then it is skipped.
help.qa: Adds a Song/Youtube Video to the Queue max Length: 1H30M
help.qra: removes either all Songs except the one that is playing right now or a certain number of songs (requires WolkeBot Role)
help.rq: Adds a random Song/a number of songs to the Queue
help.stream: Streams the selected Internet radio, you can search for radios or directly add them by appending -u url to the command
help.yts: Searches Youtube and gives you the First Result
help.ytq: Searches Youtube and adds the First Result to the Queue
help.mod-info: These Commands all require that the user has a Discord Role named WolkeBot
help.info: gives you some information about the current server
help.ban: Bans a User and deletes 7 Days of his/her messages
help.rm: removes the last 10 Messages, you can change 10 to a value between 1-100
help.noLevelServer: Disables the level system for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.noPmServer: Disables the pm notifications for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.noChServer: Disables the pm notifications for the entire server and enables channel notifications instead, use the command again to revert it
help.setLewd: Adds the current Channel as a NSFW Channel
help.remLewd: Removes the current channel from the list of NSFW channels
help.setPrefix: Sets the prefix of the bot, no spaces/mentions allowed!
help.r34: Searches Rule34 for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.kona: Searches Konachan for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.e621: Searches E621 for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.yandere: Searches Yande.re for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.level: Your Level and XP needed for next Level
help.noLevel: disables the level system for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.noPm: disables the PM notifications for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.pp: Calculates PP for the beatmap with optional accuracy and mods
help.cookie: Gives a cookie to the mentioned user or shows your cookies if no one is mentioned. (giving cookies is only usable with WolkeBot role)
help.git: Gives you the github link of the bot
help.roll: Roles a a number between zero and number, if there is no number it will be out of 10
help.8ball: Gives you the Opinion of the magic 8ball to a question
help.garfield: Gives you a random garfield command
help.cat: Sends you a random cat image
help.hug: Gives you an anime hug gif
help.slap: Gives you an anime slap gif
help.setLang: sets the language, (currently supported are de (german), en (english) and ru (russian)
help.report: If you are to shy to come on the Support Discord, use report to send a report to the Developer Wolke, but dont abuse it!
help.feedback: For feedback use the support discord please ^^
help.talk: If you want to talk with me @mention me with a message :D
help.helpReply: OK, I sent you a list of commands over PM.

version: Currently i am running on version {{version}}
add: Use this link to add me to your Server: {{- link}}
bug: Please join the support discord: {{- link}} to report a bug.

level.disabled: The XP system is disabled on this server!

joinVoice.join: Ok, joining your voice channel now
joinVoice.error: An error has occured while trying to join your voicechannel!
joinVoice.permission: No permission! You need to give yourself the WolkeBot role to use this.
joinVoice.no-voice: You are not in a voice channel!
joinVoice.already-voice: I am already in a voice channel, move me to change it!

nsfw-images.no-nsfw-channel: Please set/add a NSFW channel with !w.setLewd (in one of the NSFW Channels) to use NSFW Commands

8ball.no-message: You did not enter a question.

ban.privilege: My role does not have the right to ban {{user}} !
ban.err: An error occurred while trying to ban {{user}} !
ban.perms: You can not ban the Owner or anyone with the WolkeBot Role.
ban.self: You can not ban me with my own command.
ban.no-mention: Please mention a user you want to ban.

kick.privilege: My role does not have the right to kick {{user}} !
kick.err: An error occurred while trying to kick {{user}} !
kick.perms: You can not kick the Owner or anyone with the WolkeBot Role.
kick.self: You can not kick me with my own command.
kick.no-mention: Please mention a user you want to kick.

qa.nothing-found: No Song found with Search Term `{{search}}`
qa.empty-search: You did not enter a search Term!

qra.one-song: Use {{- prefix}}fskip to skip the current Song!

cookie.perms: You need a discord role called WolkeBot to give cookies!
cookie.one-user: Please mention **1 User**, not more, not less!

set-lang.no-lang: You did not specify a language! Currently there are de (german), en (english) and ru (russian) available.
set-lang.success: Ok i just set the language for this server to {{- language}}.
set-lang.unsupported: This language is not implemented yet, but you can help with it by adding a pull request with your language on github. Currently there are de (german), en (english) and ru (russian) available.

rem-lewd.no-nsfw: There are no NSFW Channels yet.
rem-lewd.success: Successfully removed {{- channel}} from the NSFW channels!

no-level-server.success-disable: Ok I just disabled the level system for this server, type this command again to enable it.
no-level-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled the level system for this server, type this command again to disable it.

no-pm-server.success-disable: Ok I just disabled pm notifications for this server, type this command again to enable them.
no-pm-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for this server, type this command again to disable them.

no-channel-server.success-disable: Ok I just disabled pm notifications for this server and enabled the channel notifications, type this command again to revert it.
no-channel-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for this server and disabled the channel notifications, type this command again to revert it.

no-level.success-disable: Ok, I disabled the level system for you, type this command again to enable it.
no-level.success-enable: Ok, I enabled the level system for you, type this command again to disable it.

no-pm.success-disable: Ok I just disabled pm notifications for you, type this command again to enable them.
no-pm.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for you, type this command again to disable them.

eat-cookie.failure: You dont have any Cookies to eat.

rank: You can find the Leaderboard for this Server here: {{- link}}

err.osu-api: The osu! api seems to have a small problem.
err.no-link: This is not a valid osu link!

pp.success: PP for map `{{- artist}} - {{- title}} [{{- version}}] with Acc {{- accuracy}}%` `{{- pp}}PP` `{{- mods}}`

leave: Ok i left the voice channel.

prefix.success: Ok i just set the prefix to {{- prefix}}

voice.in-queue: **{{- song}}** is already in the queue.
voice.blocked: This Video is not available to download. Maybe it is too long or blocked/removed
voice.use-proxy: Trying to download over the proxy, this could take a bit.

vskip.user-no-voice: You can not voteskip, if you are not in the same voicechannel!
vskip.same-voice: You are not in the same voicechannel as I am!

rm.less-2: You can not delete less than 2 messages!
rm.over-100: You can not delete more than 100 Messages at once!
rm.error: Error while trying to delete Messages!

set-lewd.success: Successfully added {{- channel}} to the NSFW Channels!

report: OK, I sent your report to Wolke, please dont abuse this, as it could get you banned from using the bot!
